control.name: jtag_buf_on_flex_en
control.doc: Enables JTAG buffer on servo flex.

control.name: spi2_buf_on_flex_en
control.doc: Enables SPI2 buffers on servo flex.

control.name: spi1_buf_on_flex_en
control.doc: Enables SPI1 buffers on servo flex.

control.name: id_eeprom_baddr
control.doc: Set ID EEPROM byte address to write to

control.name: id_eeprom
control.doc: ID EEPROM (256bytes). Write starting at id_eeprom_baddr or read entire EEPROM
